title: THE CORRESPONDENT
author: Virginia Evans
description: Letters from someone she used to know push Sybil Van Antwerp toward revisiting her past and finding a way to forgive.

title: THE FIRST TIME I SAW HIM
author: Laura Dave
description: Hannah’s husband turns up five years after he disappeared, which forces her to go on the run with her daughter.

title: THE WIDOW
author: John Grisham
description: When Simon Latch, a lawyer in rural Virginia, is accused of murder, he goes in search of the real killer.

title: THE SECRET OF SECRETS
author: Dan Brown
description: As he searches for the missing noetic scientist he has been seeing, Robert Langdon discovers something regarding a secret project.

title: ALCHEMISED
author: SenLinYu
description: After the war, an imprisoned alchemist is sent to a necromancer to recover her lost memories.

title: BRIMSTONE
author: Callie Hart
description: The second book in the Fae & Alchemy series. To save those close to them, Saeris and Fisher face a new set of dangers.

title: RINGS OF FATE
author: Melissa de la Cruz
description: The fate of two kingdoms depends on the actions taken by a barmaid looking for freedom and a prince who carries powerful ancient weapons.

title: MONA'S EYES
author: Thomas Schlesser
description: A 10-year-old who may get permanent vision loss is bolstered by her grandfather’s quest to bring beauty into her life; translated by Hildegarde Serle.

title: THE INTRUDER
author: Freida McFadden
description: During a rough storm, Casey puts herself in danger when she lets a girl, who is covered in blood, into her cabin.

title: DUNGEON CRAWLER CARL
author: Matt Dinniman
description: A Coast Guard vet named Carl and his ex-girlfriend’s cat, Princess Donut, are trapped in a fantasy dungeon.

title: ATMOSPHERE
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: In the summer of 1980, Joan Goodwin begins training with a group of candidates for NASA’s space shuttle program.

title: THE VIPER
author: Brad Meltzer
description: The third book in the Escape Artist series. A murder in pursuit of a priceless object brings up a cold case involving the death of Nola’s mother.

title: THE INVISIBLE WOMAN
author: James Patterson and Susan DiLallo
description: An F.B.I. agent goes undercover to look into an art dealer’s potential connection to organized crime.

title: TWICE
author: Mitch Albom
description: Alfie Logan, who was gifted with the ability to live any moment a second time but must accept the outcomes, makes a risky love decision.

title: GONE BEFORE GOODBYE
author: Reese Witherspoon and Harlan Coben
description: When a mysterious man disappears, the former combat surgeon giving him medical assistance goes on the lam.
